blocks.content_html:
Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Plugins > Mover > DefaultMovementSet > Modes

References

   
Module Mover
Header /Engine/Plugins/Experimental/Mover/Source/Mover/Public/DefaultMovementSet/Modes/SwimmingMode.h
Include #include "DefaultMovementSet/Modes/SwimmingMode.h"

Syntax

USTRUCT (BlueprintType )  
struct FSwimmingControlSettings

Remarks

Controls for the Swimming Movement.

Variables

  Type Name Description
float AngledSpeedCosAngle Angled multiplier is applied when dot product of velocity and acceleration is < this.
float AngledSpeedMultiplier Speed multiplier when moving off angle (velocity and acceleration divergent)
float BackwardsSpeedCosAngle Directional multiplier is applied when dot product of velocity and player facing direction is < this.
float BackwardsSpeedMultiplier Directional multiplier when moving mostly backwards.
float BobbingExpDragDown Bobbing: friction/drag opposed to downward velocity, squared with velocity per second. Ramps up faster with higher speeds, less effect at low speeds.
float BobbingExpDragDownSubmerged Bobbing: friction/drag opposed to upward velocity, squared with velocity per second. Ramps up faster with higher speeds, less effect at low speeds.
float BobbingExpDragMultiplier Bobbing: multiplier for the exponential drag.
float BobbingExpDragUp Bobbing: friction/drag opposed to upward velocity, squared with velocity per second. Ramps up faster with higher speeds, less effect at low speeds.
float BobbingFrictionDown Bobbing: friction/drag opposed to downward velocity, linear multiplier per second.
float BobbingFrictionDownSubmerged Bobbing: friction/drag opposed to downward velocity, linear multiplier per second. Only used when fully submerged (replaces other value).
float BobbingFrictionMultiplier Bobbing: friction multiplier, multiplies the fluid friction value.
float BobbingFrictionUp Bobbing: friction/drag opposed to upward velocity, linear multiplier per second.
float BobbingIdealDepthTolerance Bobbing: Slow down strongly when within this tolerance of the ideal immersion depth. Normally we apply drag only when going away from the ideal depth, this allows some slowdown when approaching it.
float BobbingMaxForce Bobbing:
float BoostDragMultiplier Bobbing: multiplier when in sprint boost to keep from popping up and out as much.
float BrakingDeceleration Braking deceleration (decel when letting go of input)
float CancelCrouchImmersionDepth At or below this depth, cancel and disallow crouching.
float DBNOSwimImmersionDepth At or below this depth, start swimming in DBNO.
float Friction Friction, ie how floaty or snappy is changing direction.
float FrictionDirectionChangeDot If Dot(Velocity, Acceleration) < this value, apply FrictionDirectionChangeMultiplier to friction value used. Allows lower friction when changing direction hard, which slows velocity change.
float FrictionDirectionChangeMultiplier Friction multiplier (usually < 1) when changing direction.
float FrictionSprinting Friction, ie how floaty or snappy is changing direction.
float JumpMultiplier Multiplies ground's jump speed.
float MaxAcceleration Max acceleration.
float MaxAccelerationSprinting Max acceleration while sprinting.
float MaxHorizontalEntrySpeed  
float MaxNormalSpeed Max speed when not sprinting and moving normally (before water velocity is applied)
float MaxSpeedDown  
float MaxSpeedUp  
float MaxSprintSpeed Max sprint speed (before water velocity is applied)
float MaxTargetingSpeed Max speed when targeting (before water velocity is applied)
float MaxWaterForce Max water force, after WaterVelocity * (WaterForceMultiplier * WaterForceSecondMultiplier).
float MinSprintJumpSpeed Min speed required (relative to water) to maintain sprint while jumping, otherwise will stop sprint (and change anims).
float SprintDelayAfterFiring  
float SprintJumpAirAccelAngleLimit If accel deviates from velocity by this angle while sprint jumping in air, stop sprint (and change anims).
float SprintRetriggerDelay  
float WaterForceMultiplier Multiplier to water force acceleration in direction of current.
float WaterForceSecondMultiplier Multiplier applied on the top of WaterForceMultiplier, to water force acceleration in direction of current. Used only for inherited objects.
float WaterSimMaxTimeStep Max time step allowed, to prevent huge forces on hitches.
float WaterSimSubStepTime Simulation sub-step time allowed for higher quality movement (local player and server).
float WaterVelocityDepthForMax At or above this depth, use max velocity. Interps down to WaterVelocityMinMultiplier at wading depth (where player can start swimming)
float WaterVelocityMinMultiplier Min velocity multiplier applied when depth equals min swimming depth (where they transition from wading to swimming). Interps between this and 1.0 at WaterVelocityDepthForMax.

Constructors

  Type Name Description
 

FSwimmingControlSettings ()
